amendment.description: To reaffirm that the United States maintain a one-to- two ration for contributions to the Global Fund, that the United States not exceed contributing more than 33 percent of the Global Fund's revenue.

vote.text: Amendment SA 169 agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 169 proposed by Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S2938, S2947; text: CR S2938) To reaffirm that the United States maintain a one-to- two ration for contributions to the Global Fund, that the United States not exceed contributing more than 33 percent of the Global Fund's revenue.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 169 agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 169 proposed by Senator Santorum.
